input_args.text: 'posted by Eddie Gun man have stolen a Dirty Bomb by force in Mexico and now the bomb can be on its way into the United States. Why is the media remaining silent on such an issue? I do not have any idea, but i know that mainstream media is controlled by 6 giant corporations….. so it raises my curiosity even more. A device containing radioactive substances including cesium-37 and americium-beryllium, was stolen from a government research facility in Mexico. Authorities are currently working to track down the group of men who grabbed the device Sunday night during an assault on a National Construction Laboratory warehouse in Tultitlan, Mexico state.'
